com.nttdocomo.net
Class URLDecoder

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.nttdocomo.net.URLDecoder
public class URLDecoder
extends java.lang.Object

This is the class to decode a character string of x-www-form-urlencoded form into a normal character string.

Method Summary
static java.lang.String decode(java.lang.String str)
          This decodes a URL-encoded character string into a normal character string.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

decode

public static java.lang.String decode(java.lang.String str)
This decodes a URL-encoded character string into a normal character string. After decoding a character string of x-www-form-urlencoded form, this recognizes the character string as a default encoding character string and converts it into a Unicode character string.

Parameters:
str - Designates a URL-encoded character string to be decoded.
Returns:
A decoded character string.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - Generated when "null" is set to the parameter "str".
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Generated when a character string that is not in x-www-form-urlencoded form is designated as the parameter "str".
